node.statement: HERGLOTZ REPRESENTATION: omega_p(z) = z + c_p + sum_{j=1}^{n-1} m_j/(z - p_j) with m_j > 0 and p_j real (poles interlace with roots of r by Herglotz property). Then omega_p-prime(z) = 1 - sum_j m_j/(z-p_j)^2 and omega_p-double-prime(z) = 2*sum_j m_j/(z-p_j)^3. At root lambda_i: alpha_i = sum_j m_j/(lambda_i - p_j)^3. The constraint omega_p-prime(lambda_i) = 1 gives sum_j m_j/(lambda_i - p_j)^2 = 0 for each i (a nontrivial algebraic constraint on the residues m_j and poles p_j).
